title: Rial
description: Sable Mand a.k.a. Mandy Black is on the run for her life. Among the few items on her to do checklist: surviving, getting back to her life and high-in-demand legal practice. It's not so easy to accomplish though as life on the lam tend to get complicated at times. Rial Zarain is sexy, lethal and the object of desire among weres and humans alike. He is Prime and carries the burden of ensuring the propagation of his species. He desires none of the beautiful female weres constantly paraded before him. One gaze into Mandy's eyes and he knows he's found his soulmate, biological imperative be damned. Now all he has to do is rescue his woman and convince her love trumps all.
author: Toni Dare
